bug.author: brollb
bug.summary: Incorrect argument order when executing pipeline snapshot (not debug mode)
bug.description: When the ScoreModel operation runs in the attached example (expecting a model and data), the model and data arguments are passed in the incorrect order in the generated code. This results in a python error that the Model is not iterable (the data is iterable :) ) <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deepforge-dev/deepforge/files/2206450/mnist-bad-arg-order.zip>mnist-bad-arg-order.zip</denchmark-link>
